title: Falklands: the story
brief_description: British whaling stations and meteorological outposts have operated in the Falklands for the past 40 years, but recently Argentina and Chile claimed the Islands on the basis of their geographical proximity.
description: British whaling stations and meteorological outposts have operated in the Falklands for the past 40 years, but recently Argentina and Chile claimed the Islands on the basis of their geographical proximity.
